document.full_text: a former minnesota nurse who advised depressed people over the internet the best way to tie ropes to hang themselves and encouraged one to webcast the event, was found guilty on tuesday of inciting two suicides.
document.title: former nurse advised depressed people online about suicide
lines_and_colors: a former minnesota nurse who advised depressed people over the internet the best way to tie ropes to hang themselves and encouraged one to webcast the event, was found guilty on tuesday of inciting two suicides.
